data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: ptb, Build Number: 14896, Version Hash: 44d9d2dc23e67b538a6206151ec08ecd0ffbe467
data.actual_result: The notification area expands and becomes some kind of electron webpage displaying the dragged image in full resolution. See attached video.
data.short_description: Desktop notification accepts file drag and drops on Win 7 / 8
data.steps_to_repro: - Use the Discord desktop app - Have someone DM you to receive a desktop notification - Drag an image on the notification
